text:
For issues pertaining to intellecual property rights, contact the CCP at ipr@culturalcenter.gov.ph.

 

Other issues and concerns can be addressed to:

 

Cultural Research and Development Division

Cultural Center of the Philippines

CCP Complex, Roxas Blvd., Pasay City, Metro Manila

(+632) 832-1125 local 1511-1512
